timeline.message:
Update gradle dependencies

Things done:
 - Updated dependencies to latest
 - Re-order test dependencies together
 - Use direct versioning for single use project.ext versions

Revert android material library

Reason: It requires AppTheme to inherit from MaterialComponents. That changes the overall look subtly and demands more work than just updating a gradle version number. Therefore, it's better to take care of this separately.
